text.div:
QICore Condition Criticality Codes

Value Set for QICore Condition Criticality (Example)

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/qicore-condition-criticality defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
unspecified Not Specified The criticality of the condition is not specified
self-resolving Expected to Self-Resolve The condition is expected to resolve on its own
controllable Controllable The condition is considered to be controllable
functional-loss Potential loss of function or capacity The condition may result in partial or full loss of function or capacity
life-threatening Life Threatening The condition is considered to be life-threatening
requires-hospitalization Requires Hospitalization The condition requires hospitalization

name: QICore Condition Criticality Codes
publisher: HL7 Clinical Quality Information (CQI) Work Group
description: Value Set for QICore Condition Criticality (Example)

concept.definition: The criticality of the condition is not specified
The condition is expected to resolve on its own
The condition is considered to be controllable

concept.display: Potential loss of function or capacity
concept.definition: The condition may result in partial or full loss of function or capacity
The condition is considered to be life-threatening
